author: Luiz Othero
description:
Opening taps with his feet. 

I watched the videos on the removal of PPE people need to use the water several times and have to open the tap with gloves that have been exposed to the virus and then at the end of the process, they open the faucet with ungloved hands. My suggestion is that the tap was opened with activation done by foot. Thus, people who were in contact with infected persons, can use the water during the process of removal of PPE without putting themselves at risk. This type of equipment supplied is available in the market with a low price, we can also improvise low cost solutions.
